Package org.example.v4pa.dao

Class FirstLevelDivisionQuery

java.lang.Object
org.example.v4pa.dao.FirstLevelDivisionQuery
public abstract class FirstLevelDivisionQuery extends Object
This class creates the FirstLevelDivisionQuery class that pulls FirstLevelDivision-related information from the database.
